summary: Two prankster best friends gets unwittingly involved in a terrorist plot and tries their best to save the country.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Sunil Shetty|Ayesha Jhulka|Mamta Kulkarni|Rami Reddy|Aruna Irani|Anupam Kher|Tiku Talsania|Mahesh Anand|Viju Khote|Arun Bakshi|Shubha Khote|Guddi Maruti|Sudhir Dalvi|Gavin Packard|Viju Penkar|Hanif Chatriwala|Jay Dev|Aftab Khan|Ragesh Asthana|Anand Mishra|Raju Delhiwala|Somesh Agarwal|C.P. Saxena|Dinesh Anand|Praveen Kumar|Annu Kapoor
title: Waqt Hamara Hai
